text: It would be awesome if we could get some kind of "Documentation Hub" like the knowledge base for client portals. Something similar to "Projects" even that is internal only for a portal where Agencies or even clients themselves can go to in order to read documentation on things like custom built modules or theme pieces that were created by devs.

Right now, we've used our dev portal to create a pseudo kind of documentation site for each client (really its just a root directory with subpages for each thing we did) but i think having a place in their own portal where they can reference this would be great

I think this makes sense if the client is moving their operations inside of HubSpot (as a majority of time spent). I can see the case for saying “well they’ll just use their preferred documentation system” as well though … I like the idea though
Yea it would be more for those who are moving sites over to HS for both CMS + Marketing
